title: fledge 0.1.0 (2021-12-07)
text: CRAN release: 2021-12-07 Change log management utility, initial release. main entry point bump_version(), following: Checks DESCRIPTION NEWS.md clean bumping, current branch main branch. update_news(): collects NEWS entries top-level commits update_version(): bump version DESCRIPTION, add header NEWS.md “dev”, finalize_version(): commit DESCRIPTION NEWS.md, create tag message Otherwise, commit_version(); user needs call tag_version() manually Suggests push changes upstream repository configured. haven’t committed since updating NEWS.md DESCRIPTION, can also edit NEWS.md call tag_version() . commit tag updated. Bumping can undone unbump_version(). DESCRIPTION "Date" field, populated current date update_version(). Likewise, NEWS.md contains dates headers, new versions also get date. empty list changes adds “previous version” bullet. allows bumping dev version immediately CRAN release. Also includes helper functions get_last_tag() get_top_level_commits(). Includes vignettes: “Get started”, “Using fledge”, “Fledge internals”. Examples tests supported demo project, created via with_demo_project(). Thanks Patrick Schratz Maëlle Salmon contributions!
